body.name: Ayotu Waterproof Adjustable 30 to 60 Degree Angle Mount for Video Doorbell Wired, Doorbell Mounting Bracket Wedge Corner with Rain Shield, Doorbell Angle Holder, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 16 mins
features: COMPATIBILITY：The doorbell angle mount compatible with for Video Doorbell Wired. Remove the auxiliary board, compatible with Video Doorbell 4, Video Doorbell 3/3plus, Video Doorbell 2nd Gen(2020Release)/1st Gen. Cannot be used for Video Doorbell Pro/Pro 2 (NOT include camera).
WATERPROOF CAP DESIGN: The doorbell mounting bracket with waterproof cap can block some sunlight and light rain to make the doorbell camera video clearer (but heavy rain is not useful).
ADJUSTMENT ANGLE: The doorbell bracket mount can be adjusted at an angle of 30°-60°, so that the video doorbell camera can better observe visitors and things in front of the door.
ANTI-SLIP PIECE DESIGN: The doorbell wedge kit adjustment screw has an anti-slip piece design, which can fix the angle well to prevent sliding when the doorbell is pressed.
SYMMETRICAL DESINGN: The doorbell mounting angle can be used forward and backward, which is convenient to install on the left or right to adjust the angle.

Does it include a doorbell? Without a doorbell, this is just a doorbell adjustment bracket. Will this doorbell angle mount work with a charging cable? Yes, there are holes specially designed to pass through the charging cable. Can this doorbell mounting bracket protect the doorbell from getting wet? No, it is not completely rainproof as it is not all inclusive. It can only reduce the impact on the doorbell camera in light rainy days. Does heavy rain work? The heavier the rain, the less effective the rain cover will be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well without restricting view
reviews.reviewText: The product is easy to install. It works well at blocking the sun from shining directly onto the ring doorbell while not restricting the view of the ring camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wedge w/ rain hood
reviews.reviewText: Pretty nice product, works really well to give me the angle I needed and the rain hood is an added bonus, however it does limit my viewing area just a touch, not enough to even mention really.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a must have for your house. Very durable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great (except to change the Battery)
reviews.reviewText: Kinda discovered why I could never see anything our of my Ring Door Bell (RDB) - turns out it was the light right above. Found this and it was great. Very easy to install with the RDB, looks great and the overhang blocks light at night. Having the nonslip screws is good thing if you're as clumsy as me. Only issue was when I went to change the battery out and part of the bottom blocked the release. I have a spare battery and change it when Ring says it's time. Had to clip off the bottom to make it work and it's fine. Can't see and it stays together. If you have a solar charger or it's powered other ways, it should not be an issue. I like and recommend, but keep in mind the battery swap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very easy to install. Does not reach 60* view

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars works as expected
reviews.reviewText: works as expected. The information provided by the seller is correct. The only thing that could be improved is that the mount is plastic, it could be stronger.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es plástico y no metal, muy bueno
reviews.reviewText: Lo compré ya que había adquirido un timbre ring doorbell 2da generación, me gustó por el ángulo de visión que ofrece, lamentablemente para mi gusto pensé que era de metal, ya que me daría mayor seguridad a qué no se roben el timbre, el material es de plástico de buena calidad, solo que en el lugar donde está el timbre da el sol y no se si vaya a aguantar las temperaturas, por eso en mi caso no cumplía con lo que yo quería, pero en si es muy buen producto y cumple con su función

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buen soporte/cubierta para Doorbell 4a generación
reviews.reviewText: Lo compre para instalarlo en un Ring Doorbell 4a Gen. Perfecto ajuste y facil instalación. El unico detalle que no veo muy bien es que el angulo mínimo de 30 grados que trae me resultó grande. Con un angulo menor hubiera quedado perfecta.
